## UUID class

The UUID formatter based on RFC 4122.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class UUID 
```

## Example


```ts
UUID.parse("2EB8AA08-AA98-11EA-B4AA-73B441D16380"); // { segments: ["2EB8AA08", "AA98", "11EA", "B4AA", "73B441D16380"] }
```
